[[Image:Raymond E. Feist.jpg|thumb]]
'''Raymond Elias Feist''' (born [[1945]]) is an American author who primarily writes fantasy fiction.

In his fictional world [[Wikipedia:Midkemia|Midkemia]], the Elves are known by [[Elvish#Other Elvish languages|names]] which are directly inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{webcite|author=Raymond E. Feist|articleurl=https://www.crydee.com/raymond-feist/faq/2724/why-do-elven-names-like-moredhel-sound-like-tolkein|articlename=Why do elven names like Moredhel sound like Tolkein|dated=02 July 1998|website=Crydee.com - "The official Raymond E. Feist website" |accessed= 02 September 2024}}</ref>
